description: This file defines a Sidebar component in a Qwik-based frontend application, responsible for rendering folder and tag lists, handling user interactions for folder/tag selection, and allowing addition of new folders.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: A function from Qwik used to define a component.
A Qwik utility for creating reactive functions or event handlers.

methods.name: handleFolderClick$
methods.description: Handles clicks on folder items, calling the onSelectFolder callback.

methods.name: handleTagClick$
methods.description: Handles clicks on tag items, calling the onSelectTag callback.

methods.name: handleAddFolder$
methods.description: Handles the add folder button click, invoking the optional onAddFolder callback.
